about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a humanoid reptile in this dynamic 2D platformer, blending action elements with vibrant cartoon visuals. Your mission is to navigate through numerous locations, dodge traps, fight enemies, rescue your kin, and overthrow an evil corporation bent on enslaving your home planet!

Story

On a distant planet in the far reaches of the galaxy lives a peaceful reptilian race. Life was harmonious until the arrival of Astra Chemical Corp., a human-run corporation. They began mining the planet’s acidic mineral, a critical resource for energy production used in industry and interstellar travel.

The reptilian inhabitants were enslaved to work in the mines. As the extraction became more costly and inefficient, the corporation devised a horrific alternative: harvesting acid directly from the reptilians themselves, as their bodies are composed of 95% acid.

One brave reptilian learned of the corporation’s sinister plans and vowed to stop them at all costs, setting out to save his people from extinction!

Gameplay

The reptilian hero possesses a range of abilities:

  • Run, jump, dash, wall-jump, and crawl along walls and ceilings.

  • Combat: Slash with claws, whip enemies with your tail, spit acid, and bite foes.

Utilize these skills to explore levels filled with traps and obstacles. Each level presents specific objectives, such as just collecting batteries that unlock doors, defeating enemies or rescuing captive friends.

You can approach enemies with stealth, ambushing them from ceilings, or charge head-on with claws and acid attacks.

Game Features

  • Engaging Setting and Agile Protagonist

  • Cartoon Graphics and Animation

  • Dynamic Destruction Effects: Leave a trail of destruction in your wake as you progress.

  • Three Difficulty Levels: Tailored to suit every type of player.

  • Atmospheric Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the game with a carefully crafted musical score.

Get ready to fight for freedom and save your Reptiles in this thrilling platforming adventure!

short_description: In this 2D action platformer, you'll play as a humanoid reptile and save the planet and your people from an evil corporation! Reach the control center and activate the self-destruct mechanism! It won't be easy, as there are plenty of traps, obstacles, and heavily armed guards in your way!
